Name: Building Insights I
Desc: Gain a random amount of research (0-5) for each tile built.

Name: Building Insights II
Desc: Get more research (0-10) for each tile built.

Name: Building Insights III
Desc: Get more research (0-25) for each tile built.

Name: Faster Building I
Desc: decrease build time by 6 hours

Name: Faster Building II
Desc: decrease build time by another 6 hours (12 total)

Name: Faster Building III
Desc: decrease build time by another 6 hours (18 total)

Name: Faster Building IV
Desc: decrease build time by another 6 hours (24 total)

Name: Faster Building V
Desc: decrease build time by another 6 hours (30 total)

Name: Faster Building VI
Desc: decrease build time by another 6 hours (36 total)

Name: Faster Building VII
Desc: decrease build time by another 6 hours (42 total)

Name: Faster Building VIII
Desc: decrease build time by another 6 hours (48 total)

Name: Form A Makeshift Government
Desc: Unlocks more research decisions.

Name: Debt Management I
Desc: Can build with 50 resources (for each category) that are not in storage. For example, if something costs 100 stone and you have 50, you can build it and have -50 stone after. YOU STILL NEED THE OTHER MATERIALS!

Name: Debt Management II
Desc: Can build with 200 resources that are not in storage.

Name: Debt Management III
Desc: Can build with 500 resources that are not in storage.

Name: Debt Management IV
Desc: Can build with 2500 resources that are not in storage.

Name: Debt Management V
Desc: Can build with 10000 resources that are not in storage.

Name: Debt Management VI
Desc: Can build with 100000 resources that are not in storage.

Name: Create Laws
Desc: Allows for setting up very basic Laws

Name: Makeshift Leadership
Desc: Allows for assigning/electing a temporary leader. Don't be the temporary leader for too long, workers might get mad.

Name: Resource Coordination
Desc: x1.25 resources for Iron, Stone, Wood, Water, and Food.

Name: Makeshift Police
Desc: keep criminals away better. x1.1 resources for Workers. New Laws for the police force.

Name: Makeshift Economy
Desc: Gain 1 extra gold every hour and gain Laws for the Economy.

Name: Basic Economy
Desc: Gain 3 extra gold every hour and gain Laws for the Economy.

Name: Basic Government
Desc: Allows for better Laws and more research options.

Name: Makeshift Research Labs
Desc: Allows for building Labs to generate research.

Name: Basic Research Labs
Desc: Better Research Labs.

Name: Basic Water Theory
Desc: We cannot walk on water.

Name: Basic Fire Theory
Desc: We cannot stand in fire.

Name: Basic Earth Theory
Desc: We cannot grow food on a mountain of stone.

Name: Basic Math Theory
Desc: 2 + 2 = 5, change my mind!

Name: Water Theory
Desc: We can float on water

Name: Fire Theory
Desc: We can use fire for something, I do not know yet.

Name: Earth Theory
Desc: We can grow food in farming soil.

Name: Math Theory
Desc: FINE! 2 + 2 = 4. happy?

Name: Advanced Water Theory
Desc: Good boats are nice to have.

Name: Advanced Fire Theory
Desc: Fire will be useful in a future update, I swear.

Name: Advanced Earth Theory
Desc: FOOD IS FOOD

Name: Advanced Math Theory
Desc: New ideas about what math really is.

Name: Algebra
Desc: Functions, multiplication, graphing, the basics.

Name: Trigonometry
Desc: Very useful for building stuff! How could we build without this!

Name: Calculus
Desc: Advanced math, it is scary, trust.

Name: Discrete Math
Desc: Just a bunch of hieroglyphics trying to define calculus stuff.
